sentence: Remember that one time when we were watching movies? What was your favorite character? Mine was Nakky the detective!
Hey honey! Put on some rock music for me! You like the the current track? Are you sure we can't change...?
[fade start=4 length=22]Hey honey, I am the batman![/fade]     ...nevermind...
Quaggas are animals of marvel They are so beautiful and majestatic!
...wait, what do you mean they are [color=red]extinct[/color]?! Impossible, I just saw one recently!
Apparently the God really wanted to make custom text functions, [color=red]but he failed miserably[/color].
If you think you are smart, what's '2 + 2'?
Can't answer? Duuh, obviously. It's too hard for you.
